xwikidoc.title: Sankore Email Check -- Action Needed
xwikidoc.content:
{pre} Dear Sankore Member,
Please click this link to complete step 2 of the email verification process. ${link} If the link does not open your browser, please cut and past the link into your browser.
If you received this email by mistake, please contact planete.Sankore at contact@sankore.org.
Thank you.
The planete.Sankore team planete.sankore.org {/pre}
